cleaned "state-facts.csv" by hand on 10.13.25

```{r}
state_facts <- read.csv("state_facts_handcleaned.csv")
```


```{r}
gather(state_facts, key = "specialty", value = "physicianNumbers", Psychiatry:`Endocrinology, Diabetes, and Metabolism`) %>%
  write.csv(file = "specialtyByState.csv")
```
